page.title: 04LLANGADOG C.P. SCHOOL YEAR
page.content: The school year is divided into three terms.During the year the children are involved in numerous activities.In the Autumn Term the children hold a harvest service in the school hall.The end of term is very hectic with a Concert in the Community Centre,a Carol Service,Xmas Parties and Dinners.In the Spring Term children dress up in the Welsh National Costume for a St David's Day Concert in which they recite,sing and dance. Later this term many children compete in singing,dancing,reciting and instrumetal competitions in the Urdd Eisteddfod.The Summer Term is busy with a group of children and a teacher staying for a week at a School Camp, School and Area Sports,School Trips and a Swimming Gala.During this term parents come to School to see their children's work.
